extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Browser and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the browser is affected by CVE-2023-2033 by retrieving the installed version of Google Chrome or other Chromium-based browsers.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the browser affected by CVE-2023-2033?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Google Chrome
extracted_playbook.description: Update Google Chrome to version 112.0.5615.121 for Windows, macOS, and Linux to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Chromium-based Browsers
extracted_playbook.description: Update other Chromium-based browsers such as Microsoft Edge, Brave, and Opera as soon as fixes become available to mitigate the vulnerability.

affected_products: Chromium-based browsers such as Microsoft Edge, Brave and Opera that have not yet applied the relevant fixes
